name: Galerie Anton Weller
profile:
program direction:
- promotion of young French artists
- videos, video and sound installations

Gallery history:
The Anton Weller gallery which has been structured around a two fold approach incorporating both a permanent site as well as nomadic spaces since 1994, moved to number 57, rue de Bretagne in september 1997.  It has continued to question the exhibition space around the concept "chez l´un, L´AUTRE".

Alongside the work shown and exhibitions held at 57, rue de Bretagne, the gallery puts on as many one man / woman shows as possible for its artists.

These are often held outside the gallery space, in specific places which are carefully chosen to provide an echo for their works.
